DOC.criteria: Biopsyverified urinary bladder cancer The participant must capable understand give full inform write consent age 18 year Pregnancy Lactation/breast feeding Age 85 year old Weight 140 kg Treatment neoadjuvant chemotherapy Known allergy towards 68GaNOTAAE105 Other malignant disease within last 5 year , except nonmelanoma
